1.title: Juana Victoria sale en busca de Juan Oropeza
1.plot: Juana Victoria sets out to find Juan Oropeza, the birth father she recently discovered.

2.title: Leonora se entera que Juan le fue infiel cuatro veces
2.plot: Leonora finds out that Juana cheated on her four times, resulting in four long-lost daughters.

3.title: Juana Victoria y Sebastián encuentran a Juana Soledad
3.plot: Juana Victoria and Sebastián find Juana Soledad, the first of Juana Victoria's long-lost sisters.

4.title: Juana Soledad acepta conocer a su papá
4.plot: Juana Soledad agrees to meet her birth father.

5.title: Juan Oropeza encuentra a sus cuatro hijas
5.plot: Juan Oropeza meets his four daughters together for the very first time.

6.title: Juana Victoria se entera que Sebastián se va a casar
6.plot: Darío gets into a fight with Juan after finding out that he betrayed Leonora. Sebastián tells Juana Victoria he is going to marry Estefanía. Leonora asks Juan for a divorce.

7.title: Estefanía es puesta a prueba
7.plot: Leonora starts divorce proceedings. Juana Bárbara, Juana Soledad and Juana Inés put Estefanía to the test to see if she's the right woman for Sebastián.

8.title: Juana Inés confiesa que está enamorada de Sebastián
8.plot: Juana Inés confesses that she is in love with Juana Soledad's brother. Juana Victoria and Sebastián are forced to speak to each other again after getting trapped in an elevator together. Fernando meets Juana Victoria.

9.title: Fernando está enamorado de Juana Victoria
9.plot: Juana Inés finds out that her mother has died and her sisters support her unconditionally. Fernando is fascinated by Juana Victoria and becomes convinced that she's the woman he has been waiting for his entire life.

10.title: Juana Victoria y Sebastián se declaran su amor
10.plot: The Juanas plan a party that ultimately fails. Leonora assures Juan that he could never lose her for good. Juana Victoria and Sebastián admit that they love each other, but more as siblings than lovers.

11.title: Juan quiere dar a sus hijas el apellido Oropeza
11.plot: Juan wants to includes his daughters in his will and asks them to take the last name Oropeza. In a plot to please Leonora, Darío comes up with a plan to disinherit the Juanas.

12.title: ¿Las Juanas son unas impostoras?
12.plot: Darío edits a video to make the Juanas look like scam artists. Juan falls for Darío's trick and thinks the Juanas have betrayed him for money. Todoelmundo tries to prove the video is fake.

13.title: Fernando salva la vida de Juana Victoria
13.plot: Mauricio confirms that Darío falsified the video. Estefanía suspects that Sebastián does not love her. Fernando saves Juana Victoria's life and confesses that he is in love with her.

14.title: Juana Victoria cree que no es hermana de Sebastián
14.plot: Leonora sets out to prove if the birthmarks of the Juanas are real. Juana Victoria finds out Sebastián does not have a half-moon birthmark and doubts that they could be siblings.

15.title: Las Juanas dejan al descubierto la mentira de Darío
15.plot: Todoelmundo helps the Juanas prove that Darío edited a video to falsely accuse them of being gold diggers only after Juana Oropeza's money.

16.title: Leonora cancela los trámites de su divorcio
16.plot: Leonora cancels the divorce proceedings out of jealousy over Juana Bárbara's mother. Juana Victoria finds out Sebastián's family origins to prove they are not siblings.

17.title: Un incendio consume el dispensario de las Juanas
17.plot: Darío tries to drive away the Juanas again by setting fire to their recently opened dispensary. Sebastián becomes obsessed with the idea that he does not share blood with Juana Victoria.

18.title: Juana Victoria y Sebastián comprueban que no son hermanos
18.plot: Juana Victoria proves once and for all that she and Sebastián are not brother and sister.

19.title: Sebastián renuncia al amor de Juana Victoria
19.plot: The Juanas finally manage to open their business. Sebastián asks Juana Victoria to keep it a secret that they are not really siblings because he doesn't want anyone judging Leonora for cheating on Juan.

20.title: Juana Victoria acepta sacrificar su amor
20.plot: Darío convinces Leonora that Juan is a millionaire. Juana Victoria promises to keep a secret for Juan's benefit. Sebastián and Estefanía continue to plan their wedding, with the Juanas as bridesmaids.

21.title: Juana Soledad acepta ser novia de Octavio
21.plot: Juana Victoria agrees to support Sebastián with his wedding. Even though Estefanía is convinced Sebastián does not love her, they have bachelor and bachelorette parties. Octavio and Juana Soledad officially become a couple.

22.title: Juana Victoria decide alejarse definitivamente de Sebastián
22.plot: Juan tries to make peace with Darío, but gets beaten up instead. The Juanas try to find out why Darío hates them so much. Juana Victoria and Sebastián say goodbye, since she is prepared to leave and return to the City.

23.title: Estefanía cancela su boda con Sebastián
23.plot: Sebastián's excuses are not enough for Estefanía, who decides to call off their engagement and cancel the wedding. Sebastián prevents Juana Victoria from leaving.

24.title: Juana Victoria y Sebastián deciden vivir su amor en secreto
24.plot: Darío refuses to let Estefanía leave Mazatlán and plots revenge against Sebastián. Juana Victoria and Sebastián admit their love and agree to keep it secret.

25.title: Juana Inés sospecha que Sebastián tiene una relación secreta
25.plot: Ernesto Cifuentes is at fault for making life difficult for Juan and his daughters. Leonora meets Jerome again. Juana Inés finds out Sebastián has a secret girlfriend named Julieta.

26.title: Leonora se reencuentra con el verdadero padre de Sebastián
26.plot: Juana Inés finds out Sebastián has another girlfriend. Jerome arrives in Mazatlán in the hopes of meeting his son Sebastián, despite the promise he made to Leonora.

27.title: Sebastián y Juana Victoria se entregan al amor
27.plot: To continue his revenge, Darío quits at Media Luna. Jerome meets Sebastián for the first time. Juana Victoria and Sebastián spend a romantic evening together and make love for the first time.

28.title: Juana Inés no puede controlar sus celos
28.plot: Sebastián yells at Juana Inés to leave him alone after catching her spying on him, but later finds out she is in love with him. Juana Victoria and Sebastián plan a romantic evening.

29.title: ¿Juana Inés está enamorada de Mauricio?
29.plot: When Juana Victoria confronts Juana Inés about her feelings for Sebastián, she lies and says she's fallen in love with Mauricio. Juana Victoria and Sebastián don't think they keep their relationship hidden for much longer.

30.title: Juana Victoria descubre el amor secreto de Juana Inés
30.plot: After showing off in a bikini, Juana Inés has to be hospitalized where she finally tells Juana Victoria that she is in love with Sebastián. Leonora's plan to save Media Luna fails.

31.title: Juana Victoria termina su relación con Sebastián
31.plot: After Juana Inés's confession, Juana Victoria breaks up with Sebastián. Juana Soledad has a terrifying premonition of a devastating hurricane.

32.title: Juana Inés y Mauricio quedan atrapados en medio del huracán
32.plot: Hurricane Juana hits Mazatlán. While Darío tries to save Leonora, Mauricio and Juana Inés become trapped in the middle of the storm - putting their lives in grave danger.

33.title: Mauricio arriesga su vida para salvar a Juana Inés
33.plot: The hurricane destroys Media Luna. Juana Inés is rescued by Mauricio, but her health is delicate because of some severe injuries. Mauricio finds out that Juana Inés is in love with him.

34.title: Leonora descubre que las Juanas viven en su casa
34.plot: Juan discovers he has been the victim of fraud and Media Luna is not insured, so he can not afford to rebuild after the hurricane's destruction. Leonora finds the Juanas living in her house.

35.title: Estefanía no puede estar lejos de Sebastián y decide regresar
35.plot: Leonora allows the Juanas to live in her house. Juana Bárbara realizes she is in love with Mauricio. Estefanía decides to return to Mazatlán because she cannot bear to be separated from Sebastián.

36.title: Juan se entera que Juana Soledad está embarazada
36.plot: Sebastián discovers that Juana Inés is in love with him. Juana Bárbara decides to try getting Mauricio's attention. In the midst of so many tragedies, Juan is grateful to Juana Soledad for making him a grandfather.

37.title: Darío contrata a Juana Victoria para cuidar a Estefanía
37.plot: Juana Inés wakes from her coma with amnesia. Desperate, Darío offers Juan money to convince Sebastián to marry Estefanía. Juana Victoria accepts the task of caring for Estefanía.

38.title: Espinoza Paz sorprende con su llegada a Mazatlán
38.plot: When Espinoza Paz gives a concert in Mazatlán, Octavio is presumed to be his cousin. The singer refuses to meet Octavio but invites the Juanas to his concert. Juana Soledad confirms her pregnancy.

39.title: Darío presiona a Sebastián para que se case con Estefanía
39.plot: Leonora sets up a trap for Estefanía to get her back together with Sebastián. Sebastián rejects Darío's proposal when he tries to negotiate for his daughter's happiness. Espinoza Paz helps to reconstruct the Dolorosa.

40.title: Juana Inés recuerda que Mauricio le salvó la vida
40.plot: Juana Inés remembers that Mauricio saved her life. Darío discovers that Mauricio owns the Dolorosa and that the Juanas work with him. Juana Soledad is unsure about marrying Octavio.

41.title: Juana Inés y Mauricio ya son novios
41.plot: Espinoza Paz re-opens the Dolorosa. Juana Inés and Mauricio are finally a couple, but their relationship is interrupted when he is arrested. Juana Soledad agrees to marry Octavio, but discovers that she is not actually pregnant.

42.title: Estefanía decide reconquistar a Sebastián
42.plot: Sebastián begins the search for his biological father. Estefanía asks Juana Victoria to help her earn back Sebastián's love.

43.title: Sebastián cree saber quién es su padre biológico
43.plot: Sebastián discovers that Ernesto Cifuentes was Leonora's lover and believes he is his biological father. Juana Bárbara intends to get in the way of Juana Inés and Mauricio's relationship. Sebastián agrees to be friends with Estefanía.

44.title: Juana Victoria explota en celos
44.plot: Juana Victoria knows Estefanía wants to get back together with Sebastián and can't avoid causing a scene because of intense jealousy.

45.title: Juana Inés logra vengarse de Juana Bárbara
45.plot: Estefanía begins a new strategy to win back Sebastián. Juana Inés defends her love for Mauricio and vows revenge against Juana Bárbara. Jerome returns to town, ready to tell Sebastián that he is his biological father.

46.title: Darío tiene a Sebastián en sus manos
46.plot: After running out of timeshare profits, the Oropeza family has to start cutting back on their expenses. This leads Sebastián to seriously consider accepting Darío's proposal.

47.title: Sebastián sospecha que Jerome es su padre
47.plot: Juana Victoria and Sebastián jump to conclusions that Jerome is Sebastián's real father, especially when Leonora becomes incredibly nervous around Jerome.

48.title: ¡Juana Bárbara gana su primera pelea!
48.plot: Sebastián confirms that Jerome is his biological father. Juana Inés bets on Mauricio's love with Juana Bárbara, based on whoever wins the boxing tournament. Leonora finds out that Juan is in financial ruin.

49.title: Leonora chantajea a Sebastián para que se case con Estefanía
49.plot: Leonora pretends to be near death to blackmail Sebastián into marrying Estefanía. Sebastián asks Juana Victoria to run away with him so they can live together and love each other freely.

50.title: Juana Victoria le rompe el corazón a Sebastián
50.plot: Juana Victoria believes Sebastián is going to accept Darío's proposition. Intent on upsetting Sebastián, Juana Victoria kisses Fernando and ends up leading him on in the process.

51.title: Sebastián decide retomar su noviazgo con Estefanía
51.plot: Juana Bárbara faces the "Rusa Asesina", a boxer Darío hired to prevent the Oropeza family from getting the money they need. Leonora succeeds in convincing Sebastián to get back together with Estefanía.

52.title: Juana Victoria y Fernando inician una relación
52.plot: Estefanía asks for Darío's help when she finds out Sebastián is in love with another woman. Mauricio discovers Juana Bárbara and Juana Inés are competing for his affection. Fernando and Juana Victoria become a couple.

53.title: Juana Victoria descubre el chantaje de Leonora
53.plot: Darío raises the closure of the Dolorosa in exchange for Mauricio working for him. Juana Victoria finds out Leonora was faking her depression to blackmail Sebastián into getting back together with Estefanía.

54.title: Juana Inés y Juana Bárbara hacen las paces
54.plot: Leonora continues her revenge plot against Juan by hiding their financial ruin from him. Darío finds out Sebastián is a lover to one of his sisters. Juana Inés and Juana Bárbara make amends.

55.title: Juana Inés y Mauricio planean su primera noche romántica
55.plot: Leonora tries to run over Margarita with her car because she thinks Margarita is Juan's lover. Darío demands Sebastián cut off his relationship with his sister. Juana Inés and Mauricio make love for the first time.

56.title: Mauricio le propone matrimonio a Juana Inés
56.plot: When Juana Inés tells Mauricio she does not feel ready to have sex yet, he fears he might have pressured her. To demonstrate his love, Mauricio proposes to Juana Inés. Estefanía finally discovers that Sebastián is in love with his sister.

57.title: Estefanía se enfrenta con Juana Victoria
57.plot: When Sebastián tries to break up with Estefanía, he learns that Juan was arrested for assaulting Ernesto Cifuentes. Juana Victoria reveals to Estefanía that Sebastián is not her brother.

58.title: Sebastián decide casarse con Estefanía
58.plot: Alberto threatens to kill Juana Victoria's sisters if she does not leave Mazatlan with Juana Bárbara and Margarita. Sebastián accepts the money Darío is offering in exchange for marrying Estefanía.

59.title: Sebastián adelanta su boda con Estefanía
59.plot: After finding out Sebastián is going to get married, Juana Victoria sets a trap for Alberto. Sebastián decides to hasten his wedding to Estefanía so that Juan will be freed as soon as possible.

60.title: Juana Victoria y Juana Bárbara arriesgan su vida para salvar a Alberto
60.plot: Alberto dies after attempting to sexually assault Juana Bárbara. Sebastián leaves his wedding to help his father. Leonora begins to forgive Juan a little after he is finally freed from prison.

61.title: Juana Victoria le confiesa a Fernando que lo usó
61.plot: Juana Victoria breaks Fernando's heart by confessing that she used him because she is in love with Sebastián. Estefanía is willing to accept Darío's help separating Juana Victoria and Sebastián.

62.title: Leonora corre a Juana Victoria de su casa
62.plot: Leonora forgets Estefanía's plan and throws Juana Victoria out of her house. Juan is furious at Leonora and invites Juana Victoria to return. Juana Inés surprises Mauricio with a sexy new look.

63.title: Estefanía manipula a las hermanas de Juana Victoria
63.plot: Estefanía gains the trust of Juana Victoria's sisters, succeeding in turning them against Juana Victoria by revealing her secret relationship with Sebastián.

64.title: La relación de Juana Victoria y Sebastián es descubierta
64.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

65.title: Estefanía atenta contra su propia vida
65.plot: Estefanía throws herself into a glass window and frames Juana Victoria for causing her serious injuries. Darío tries to strange Juana Victoria in revenge for hurting his daughter.

66.title: Juan quiere divorciarse de Leonora
66.plot: Juan finds out Leonora faked her depression, leading him to want a divorce. After suffering an anxiety attack, Estefanía continues her plan to get Juana Victoria out of her life.

67.title: Fernando besa a Juana Bárbara
67.plot: Sebastián intends to return to his relationship with Juana Victoria. Fernando kisses Juana Bárbara to convince her to achieve her dreams. Juana Soledad and Juana Inés are arrested by the police.

68.title: Leonora se vuelve aliada de las Juanas
68.plot: Estefanía asks the Juanas for one more test of their loyalty and loses control in front of Leonora. Leonora decides to ally herself with the Juanas to get help for Darío's daughter.

69.title: Estefanía tiene a Leonora en sus manos
69.plot: Leonora changes her mind about the Juanas and confronts Estefanía about her schemes and blackmail. Estefanía threatens to reveal Leonora's secrets if she betrays her. Juana Inés beats up Estefanía.

70.title: Darío asesina a Ernesto Cifuentes
70.plot: In a deranged fit, Estefanía provokes Petunia's death. Father Camilo cannot marry Estefanía and Sebastián in the church. Darío murders Ernesto Cifuentes.

71.title: Estefanía desaparece el día de su boda religiosa
71.plot: Estefanía accepts that she has a mental illness and asks Sebastián to forgive her for what she's done. When Estefanía never arrives to the religious ceremony at her wedding, Juana Victoria is the main suspect in her disappearance.

72.title: Juana Victoria es sospechosa de la desaparición de Estefanía
72.plot: Fearing Estefanía might have committed suicide, Darío orders a desperate search for her. The Juanas are interrogated and Juana Victoria becomes the prime suspect in Estefanía's disappearance.

73.title: Juana Victoria va a prisión acusada de provocar la muerte de Estefanía
73.plot: Darío accuses Juana Victoria and Sebastián of killing his daughter. Detectives confirm that the murder weapon traces back to Juana Victoria, who is immediately sent to prison.

74.title: ¡Sebastián descubre que Estefanía está viva!
74.plot: Sebastián discovers Estefanía faked her death to frame Juana Victoria for her murder. Darío orders Juana Victoria's death. Sebastián begins a search for Estefanía to prove Juana Victoria's innocence.

75.title: Estefanía se entrega a la autoridades
75.plot: Juana Victoria is freed from jail after Estefanía decides to confess to the police that she faked her disappearance in a plot to ruin Juana Victoria and Sebastián.

76.title: Juana Bárbara enfrentara a 'La Barby Juárez'
76.plot: Leonora suffers a heart attack after learning that Sebastián and Juana Victoria already know they are not half siblings. Juana Bárbara goes up against boxing champion 'La Barby Juárez'.

77.title: Leonora es humillada por Darío
77.plot: Leonora endures Darío's humiliations in return for him keeping her secret. Jerome returns to Mazatlán to become a partner at Media Luna and admits to being Sebastián's biological father.

78.title: Los crímenes de Darío están a punto de ser descubiertos
78.plot: Juan finds out Darío's plan to destroy his marriage and his blackmailing of Leonora. Thanks to Juana Soledad, Sebastián and Juan discover Darío is responsible for Ernesto Cifuentes's murder.

79.title: Leonora confiesa que Sebastián no es hijo de Juan
79.plot: In the name of love for Sebastián, Leonora confesses that he is not Juan Oropeza's son. The police are on the lookout for Darío, but he still succeeds in his revenge plot to kidnap Leonora.

80.title: ¡Juana Victoria muere en brazos de Sebastián!
80.plot: Estefanía betrays Darío and succeeds in running away. Juana Inés and Juana Soledad's wedding days arrive, but Juana Victoria is not there. She dies in Sebastián's arms after falling victim to Darío's vengeance.

81.title: ¡Juana Victoria está viva!
81.plot: The Oropeza family says goodbye to Juana Victoria without suspecting that she is not really dead. Darío made Juana Victoria appear dead as revenge on her and Sebastián for Estefanía's sake.

82.title: Capítulo Final: Juana Victoria y Sebastián viven su amor libremente
82.plot: Sebastián rescues Juana Victoria after discovering Darío's awful deeds. Juana Victoria and Sebastián are finally free to love freely for the rest of their lives. The Juanas all achieve their dreams and have bright futures in front of them.

imdb.title: Hijas de la luna
plot: The lives of four women - all named Juana - are forever changed when they discover they are sisters from the same long-lost father.::skillwithaquill
